General.Name: Kedawung Setia Industrial Tbk
General.Description: PT Kedawung Setia Industrial Tbk produces and sells corrugated cardboard boxes, egg holders, and enamel-coated household appliances in Indonesia. It is also involved in the exporting activities. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Kedawung Setia Industrial Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kitasubur Utama.
